issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: add a setting to disable row.serde for specific formats; enable for others

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
*Turn ON text vectorization related variable* hive.vectorized.use.vector.serde.deserialize by default.

Row-mode (hive.vectorized.use.row.serde.deserialize) is handled by a separate JIRA HIVE-16222)
fields.summary: Vectorization: Turn on text vectorization by default (vector serde)

ATTACHMENT ID: 12850740 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Backoff on row mode until HIVE-16222 is done  (because row mode causes vectorized_parquet_types.q to fail).
Hmm, I thought the plan was to do it the other way around. I will commit HIVE-16222 then
Actually that is still pending tests... so I will commit at some point.
